source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000010_THANCRED<tab>Now then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000010_THANCRED<tab>Bien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000020_THANCRED<tab>'Tis I. The situation may be more complicated than we anticipated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000020_THANCRED<tab>Urianger<var 1D /var>? C'est moi, Thancred. La situation est plus compliquée que nous ne le pensions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000030_URIANGER<tab>Indeed. I shall remain watchful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000030_URIANGER<tab>... Très bien. Je vous contacterai si je remarque quoi que ce soit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000040_URIANGER<tab>Ere thou goest─another matter requireth thine attention. A young maiden, full eager to─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000040_URIANGER<tab>À propos, Thancred, il y a de temps à autre des jeunes femmes qui demandent à vous voir. Que dois-je répondre au juste<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000050_URIANGER<tab>Wherefore inquirest thou of her fairness!? Very well. Be she damsel or devil, I shall direct her steps to Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000050_URIANGER<tab>... Je vois. Dans ce cas, je dirai à ces demoiselles que l'élu de leur cœur, ou leur ennemi juré, se trouve au nord, au Glas des revenants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000060_URIANGER<tab>...Save thine insinuations for one given to such impropriety. Thou shalt not find me amenable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000060_URIANGER<tab>Ne dit-on pas que le passé revient toujours nous hanter<var 1D /var>? Vous feriez bien de ne pas l'oublier, mon ami...
Sur ce, au revoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000070_YUGIRI<tab>(-???-)Far across the sea, from the land of Doma, have we traveled. We seek audience with the ruler of these lands. Who here speaks for you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000070_YUGIRI<tab>(-???-)Nous venons de la contrée orientale de Doma et souhaitons obtenir audience auprès du seigneur de ces terres. Où pouvons-nous le trouver<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100010_YUGIRI<tab>We have traveled some several thousand malms across the sea, from the nation of Doma, in hopes that we might find sanctuary in these lands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100010_YUGIRI<tab>Mon nom est Yugiri. Mes compagnons et moi avons traversé la mer depuis notre cité orientale de Doma pour venir chercher refuge ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sanctuary, Lady Yugiri?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Refuge<var 1D /var>? Comment ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100030_YUGIRI<tab>Aye. Lying within Othard, Doma was under the dominion of the Garlean Empire, as I am sure you are aware.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100030_YUGIRI<tab>Voyez-vous, mon pays était une province garlemaldaise. Il va sans dire que c'est l'Empire qui nous avait annexés de force.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100040_YUGIRI<tab>When the war of succession broke out in Garlemald, we espied an opportunity to free ourselves from the yoke of imperial oppression, and took up arms.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100040_YUGIRI<tab>Il y a quelque temps, un conflit a déchiré nos occupants autour de la succession impériale. Nous avons jugé que c'était l'occasion de nous soulever contre l'envahisseur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100050_YUGIRI<tab>...Only to be crushed. And so I gathered what few Domans escaped the reckoning, and guided them hither to your shores.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100050_YUGIRI<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, notre rébellion a rapidement été écrasée. J'ai aidé mes semblables à s'enfuir avant de conduire un groupe de survivants en Éorzéa par la voie des eaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100060_ALPHINAUD<tab>A war of succession...? Then the Emperor... Forgive me, you said that Doma “was” under imperial rule, did you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Survivants<var 1D /var>? Vous voulez dire que Doma...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100070_YUGIRI<tab>Doma is gone. Razed to the ground as an example to the other provinces.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100070_YUGIRI<tab>Hélas, oui. Notre cité a été lit<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment rayée de la carte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Twelve have mercy... And your people?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100080_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'imagine que c'est ce qui vous amène en Éorzéa. Vous souhaitez demander l'asile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100090_YUGIRI<tab>On a ship anchored in Vesper Bay, flying borrowed colors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100090_YUGIRI<tab>En effet. Mes compagnons sont sur un bateau, ancré au large de ce port où nous avons accosté... la baie des Vêpres, c'est cela<var 1D /var>? Nous l'avons maquillé en navire marchand pour éviter toute suspicion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100100_YUGIRI<tab>Many were complicit in the rebellion, or are kin to those who were. They will not come ashore until I send word that it is safe to do so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100100_YUGIRI<tab>À bord se trouvent ceux qui ont pris part à la rébellion, accompagnés de leurs familles. Mes compagnons et moi sommes venus négocier auprès du gouvernement uldien en leur nom.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100110_YUGIRI<tab>I sought an audience with your rulers, but was summarily refused.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100110_YUGIRI<tab>Nous avons tenté de rencontrer le souverain ou dirigeant de cette nation, mais on nous a froidement refusé toute audience.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100120_ALPHINAUD<tab>The lords of Ul'dah are not wont to entertain foreign refugees without suitable encouragement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100120_ALPHINAUD<tab>La cour est sans doute peu encline à recevoir un groupe d'étrangers débarquant à l'improviste...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100130_YUGIRI<tab>Mayhap I was foolish to expect otherwise. But our supplies run low, and we have young ones in urgent need of care.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100130_YUGIRI<tab>J'admets volontiers que j'ai été naïve sur ce point. Mais nos provisions s'amenuisent de jour en jour, et il y a beaucoup d'enfants sur notre navire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100140_YUGIRI<tab>I have seen the tents outside the gates, however. We are not the first to seek asylum, nor will we be the last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100140_YUGIRI<tab>En venant ici, j'ai également aperçu nombre de réfugiés aux portes de la ville. Cette cité semble déjà fortement sollicitée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100150_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Be that as it may, Ul'dah is no friend to Garlemald. Your tale would stir the hearts of many men and women here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans tous les cas, je comprends mieux votre situation. L'empire de Garlemald est aussi notre ennemi. Rien ne garantit que nous ne subirons pas un jour le même sort que vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>The sultana and the Syndicate will not be so easily swayed─but I shall see that you are granted an opportunity to plead your case.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je vais me charger de vous obtenir une audience auprès de la Sultane. J'ignore quelle en sera l'issue, mais vous aurez au moins la chance d'expliquer ce qui vous est arrivé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100170_YUGIRI<tab>This is within your power?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100170_YUGIRI<tab>Vous feriez cela pour nous<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well...far be it from me to boast, but I do have the ear of certain influential individuals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oui. Je n'en ai peut-être pas l'air, mais j'ai une certaine influence auprès des dirigeants éorzéens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100190_YUGIRI<tab>I am in your debt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100190_YUGIRI<tab>Nous vous en serions infiniment re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lady Yugiri, forgive me for observing, but...your choice of attire seems like to evoke feelings of mistrust.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais si vous me permettez... Votre tenue attise ma curiosité, Dame Yugiri. Et je ne crois pas en avoir déjà vu en Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100210_YUGIRI<tab>Men are wont to fear the unfamiliar. We know this from experience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100210_YUGIRI<tab>Je vous prie d'excuser mon accoutrement. Les différences sont souvent la cause de malentendus... Nous en avons déjà fait l'expérience par le passé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100220_YUGIRI<tab>We seek only to spare the people of Ul'dah unnecessary disquiet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100220_YUGIRI<tab>Tout ce que nous demandons, c'est de l'aide... Il n'est pas dans nos intentions de créer le moindre trouble en ces lieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100230_ALPHINAUD<tab>I shall defer to your experience, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Très bien. Voilà une sage résolution. Et vous n'avez pas à vous excuser pour la façon dont vous vous habillez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100240_YUGIRI<tab>I thank you for your understanding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100240_YUGIRI<tab>Votre compréhension et votre amabilité nous vont droit au cœur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100250_ALPHINAUD<tab>It seems I have urgent business with the Flame General. I leave our guests in your capable hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100250_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je vais de ce pas parler au général Aldynn. Mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, je vous prie de bien vouloir veiller sur ces gens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200000_YUGIRI<tab>I, Yugiri of Doma, am honored to meet you at last, Your Grace. To mark this auspicious occasion, I should like to present to you the finest treasures our humble nation has to offer...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200000_YUGIRI<tab>Votre Majesté, je vous remercie humblement de m'accorder audience. La bienséance aurait voulu que je vous apporte des présents de ma contrée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200010_YUGIRI<tab>Alas, the circumstances which have brought me here today have divested me of both time and dignity. I come before you as a pauper in direst need of aid─to request that you grant my people asylum.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200010_YUGIRI<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, telles n'étaient pas les conditions de notre départ de Doma. Je vous prie donc de bien vouloir m'excuser pour cette incivilité.
Je suis ici pour vous demander humblement l'asile dans votre cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200020_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I, Nanamo, seventeenth in the line of Ul, welcome you to our city. Be at ease, Lady Yugiri.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200020_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous, Nanamo Ul Namo, 17e sultane d'Ul'dah, te souhaitons la bienvenue.
Yugiri, c'est bien cela<var 1D /var>? Mets-toi à ton aise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Although I myself have heard the tale of your misfortune, I would ask that you recount it once more for the benefit of the others here present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Alphinaud nous a expliqué votre situation, à toi et aux tiens. Votre cité a été détruite par l'Empire, c'est bien cela<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200040_YUGIRI<tab>As you wish, Your Grace. For many years, my nation, Doma, suffered under the yoke of imperial rule, and my people yearned to be free. Thus, when a war of succession broke out in Garlemald, we sought to take advantage of the chaos and reclaim our liberty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200040_YUGIRI<tab>Oui, tout à fait, Votre Majesté... Garlemald est ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment plongé dans le chaos du fait de luttes internes autour de la succession au trône. Cette situation se ressent jusque dans les provinces impériales.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200050_YUGIRI<tab>Alas, our enemy proved less preoccupied than we had hoped, and our rebellion was put down in the most brutal fashion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200050_YUGIRI<tab>Nous avons essayé d'en profiter pour nous rebeller et reprendre notre indépendance, mais nous avons échoué. L'Empire a mis à feu et à sang notre patrie pour montrer à tous les peuples qui sont sous son joug que l'obéissance ou la soumission sont les seules voies possibles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200060_RAUBAHN<tab>Those who survived─how many do they number?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200060_RAUBAHN<tab>Et vous avez donc fui par la mer depuis Doma. Combien de vos compatriotes se sont échappés avec vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200070_YUGIRI<tab>More than two hundred souls huddle within the cramped confines of our own galleon's hold. Yet this figure accounts for but one of a number of ships which escaped the purge.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200070_YUGIRI<tab>Deux cents des miens sont cachés dans la cale de notre navire, serrés les uns contre les autres. Et ce n'est là qu'un seul des vaisseaux qui ont fui notre patrie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200080_YUGIRI<tab>It is my hope that you will allow us all to dwell within your walls. Should that prove unfeasible, however, I humbly ask that you accept as many of my people as your resources allow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200080_YUGIRI<tab>Si vous acceptez de nous accueillir sur votre terre, j'aimerais y faire venir le reste de mon peuple.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200090_YUGIRI<tab>Pray understand, we do not beg a boon, but propose instead an arrangement. We would serve─as soldiers or tradesmen─until our debt is repaid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200090_YUGIRI<tab>Bien sûr, nous n'espérons pas obtenir une telle faveur sans contrepartie. Nous sommes prêts à vous offrir nos services comme soldats ou travailleurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200100_RAUBAHN<tab>What are the Syndicate's opinions on this matter?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200100_RAUBAHN<tab>Quelle est l'opinion du Cartel sur cette question<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I, for one, think it's a marvelous idea. Lady Yugiri and her people strike me as an industrious lot, and there are parts of the city which have yet to be fully restored. If they are willing to work, I see no reason not to let them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Cette offre me paraît tout à fait acceptable. Il est indéniable que depuis le septième fléau, nous manquons cruellement de main-d'œuvre pour les travaux de recon<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion et de développement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200120_ALPHINAUD<tab>The head of the Mirage Trust is not known for his generosity. He sees profit in this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200120_ALPHINAUD<tab>(Cet homme est Teledji Adeledji, le président du groupe Mirage. C'est lui qui contrôle le monde de la finance à Ul'dah.)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200130_RAUBAHN<tab>I agree. That said, these are foreign refugees. To admit them would require a formal resolution. Shall we call a vote?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200130_RAUBAHN<tab>Comme ces gens sont originaires d'une terre lointaine, il faudra sûrement adapter la loi, mais il me semble tout à fait envisageable de les accueillir ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200140_LOLORITO<tab>The law is the law.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200140_LOLORITO<tab>Je suis au regret de vous dire que je ne puis me montrer favorable à un tel projet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200150_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Lord Lolorito?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200150_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Et pourquoi donc, Seigneur Lolorito<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200160_LOLORITO<tab>Tell me: are you blind or willfully ignorant? Even now, our streets are choked with the displaced victims of the Calamity and Ala Mhigan refugees.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200160_LOLORITO<tab>Ouvrez les yeux<var 1D /var>! Ul'dah grouille déjà de réfugiés du Fléau et d'immigrés mhigois. Et cela fait plus de cinq ans que bon nombre d'entre eux vivent aux crochets de notre cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200170_LOLORITO<tab>They live hand-to-mouth, subsisting on aid provided by the Immortal Flames─the cost of which grows ever higher!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200170_LOLORITO<tab>Avec les nouvelles mesures d'aide des Immortels, leur présence va nous coûter encore plus cher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200180_LOLORITO<tab>The wealth of Ul'dah is not without limits, my friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200180_LOLORITO<tab>Les fonds publics se réduisent à une telle vitesse que l'on peut dif<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment encore appeler Ul'dah la “Cité d'or”. Dans ces conditions, nous ne pouvons absolument pas nous permettre d'accueillir de nouveaux nécessiteux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200190_LOLORITO<tab>And need I remind you that these refugees are prone to violence and criminal activity? You have all read the reports, I think?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200190_LOLORITO<tab>Qui plus est, la criminalité liée aux immigrés est en hausse. Vous n'êtes pas sans savoir cela, Teledji Adeledji<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200200_LOLORITO<tab>Without homes or employment, it is only a matter of time before men grow desperate and take that which they imagine has been unjustly denied them. Yet, knowing this, you would have us swell their ranks. Mayhap you think the Brass Blades and the Flames are not hard-pressed enough?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200200_LOLORITO<tab>Nombre d'entre eux n'arrivent pas à trouver de travail, sombrent dans la violence et le crime. La situation est telle que même les Immortels et les lames de cuivre ne parviennent pas à enrayer ce phénomène.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Some say the chairman of the East Aldenard Trading Company passes gil thrice daily. This may explain how he came to be the wealthiest man in Ul'dah. Or it may simply be that he's ruthless beyond reckoning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200210_ALPHINAUD<tab>(Le seigneur Lolorito est le président de la Firme du commerce de l'Aldenard oriental... et à la tête d'une telle fortune qu'on le surnomme “le milliardaire”. Il est de facto le membre le plus puissant et le plus influent du Cartel.)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200220_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Surely the sultanate can support the few hundred Domans Lady Yugiri represents? That our resources have been taxed I do not deny, but we are hardly in danger of financial collapse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200220_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>... Seigneur Lolorito. Malgré la piètre situation financière de notre cité, il nous semble tout à fait possible d'accueillir au moins Yugiri et son groupe à Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200230_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I move that an exception be made.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200230_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Pour ce qui est de la criminalité, nous proposons de revoir la loi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200240_LOLORITO<tab>An exception, Your Grace? I am suddenly reminded of a similar debate some years ago, regarding a number of Ala Mhigan refugees, if memory serves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200240_LOLORITO<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! C'est ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment une excellente idée, Votre Majesté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200250_LOLORITO<tab>What were your words that day? Ah, yes: “The law is the law.” And so our visitors remained in Little Ala Mhigo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200250_LOLORITO<tab>Et peut-on savoir quand exactement les sultanistes comptent enfin proposer cet amendement à la loi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200260_LOLORITO<tab>Mayhap our wise and benevolent sultana would be so good as to enlighten us as to which other of our laws should not be upheld?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200260_LOLORITO<tab>Savez-vous depuis combien d'années les Mhigois sont installés dans le Thanalan<var 1D /var>? À l'époque, on nous promettait de nouvelles lois, mais rien n'a été fait et on a laissé ces réfugiés s'approprier le hameau qu'on appelle aujourd'hui Petite Ala Mhigo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200270_RAUBAHN<tab>Mind your tongue, Lolorito.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200270_RAUBAHN<tab>Surveillez vos paroles, Seigneur Lolorito<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200280_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>My lord, I share your concern for the welfare of our great nation, but we must endeavor to take a longer view. You know as well as I that people can be a resource still more precious than gil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200280_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>N'oublions pas que les gens sont une richesse. Ces réfugiés seront peut-être un jour la base qui permettra à Ul'dah de devenir plus forte. Vous devriez peut-être reconsidérer...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200290_LOLORITO<tab>Precious or not, they were never yet so reliable. And unlike those who frequent your establishment, I have no desire to gamble with my future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200290_LOLORITO<tab>Voilà pourquoi on vous reproche votre mollesse, Teledji Adeledji. Les hommes et l'argent sont les piliers d'un État, mais sa base doit être un pouvoir fort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200300_LOLORITO<tab>Ul'dah's greatest asset is, and has ever been, her material wealth. We risk this at our peril.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200300_LOLORITO<tab>Et c'est justement ce qui fait ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment défaut à Ul'dah. Sans un gouvernement stable, il nous est impossible de bâtir quoi que ce soit de durable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200310_LOLORITO<tab>One need only look to Teledji Adeledji's example for evidence of the danger in allowing sentiment to dictate policy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200310_LOLORITO<tab>À ce propos, on me rapporte que les affaires du Mirage de platine ne se portent pas très bien, ces temps-ci.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200320_LOLORITO<tab>How far the vaunted Mirage hath fallen, both in repute and profitability, since he began employing refugees...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200320_LOLORITO<tab>Se pourrait-il que la piètre qualité du service fasse fuir la clientèle<var 1D /var>? Quand on exploite des réfugiés payés une bouchée de pain, il ne faut pas s'étonner que la réputation de l'éta<var 16 /var>blis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment finisse par en pâtir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200330_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>How I choose to conduct my affairs is not your concern, my lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200330_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200340_RAUBAHN<tab>A proposal has been tabled. Given its urgency, I move we forgo further debate and call a vote.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200340_RAUBAHN<tab>Ces échanges d'invectives ne nous mènent nulle part<var 1D /var>! Prenons plutôt une décision.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200350_RAUBAHN<tab>To accept the Doman refugees or not. Those in favor, I bid you remain. Those opposed, I bid you leave.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200350_RAUBAHN<tab>Que tous ceux qui sont favorables à l'accueil des réfugiés de Doma restent. Les autres, vous pouvez partir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200360_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Would that it were within my power to welcome you and your people, Lady Yugiri. As you have observed, however, my authority in such matters is regrettably limited.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200360_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous sommes désolée, Yugiri. Comme tu peux le voir, le pouvoir de la sultane a ses limites dans cette cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200370_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Without the consent of the Syndicate, I cannot act.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200370_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>À notre plus grand regret, nous pouvons dif<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment prendre la moindre décision sans obtenir l'accord préalable du Cartel des Scorpions...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200380_YUGIRI<tab>I understand, Your Grace. And I appreciate all that you have done on our behalf.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200380_YUGIRI<tab>Ne vous reprochez rien, Votre Majesté. Le fait même que vous ayez écouté notre demande est déjà beaucoup d'honneur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200390_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>The nerve of the man... If that bastard had not forsaken the eastern trade route, Little Ala Mhigo would now be thriving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200390_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>... Maudit Lolorito. C'est aussi parce qu'il a abandonné le commerce oriental par voie terrestre que Petite Ala Mhigo est dans cet état aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200400_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>That you should have traveled so far, under such dire circumstances, only to be refused in this manner is utterly unconscionable. Pray accept my sincerest apologies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200400_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>J'imagine ce que vous avez dû endurer pour venir jusqu'ici. J'aurais vraiment aimé pouvoir vous aider.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200410_RAUBAHN<tab>Now that the Empire no longer poses an immediate threat, they see little reason to maintain the pretense of unity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200410_RAUBAHN<tab>J'ai honte quand je vois que notre cité n'est pas encore unie, alors que les grandes compagnies arrivent à s'allier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200420_RAUBAHN<tab>The Monetarists have grown especially defiant of late─Lord Lolorito most of all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200420_RAUBAHN<tab>Ce sont les monétaristes, ou plutôt, c'est le seigneur Lolorito qui a bien trop de pouvoir. Il pourrait devenir dangereux, à terme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200430_RAUBAHN<tab>But this is neither the time nor place for that discussion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200430_RAUBAHN<tab>Ce n'est pas le lieu pour discuter de cela... Sortons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300010_THANCRED<tab>How goes the fishing? Caught anything slippery?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300010_THANCRED<tab>Alors, as-tu découvert quelque chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300020_YSHTOLA<tab>Aye. Our suspicions were well founded. The Serpent Reavers are indeed the culprits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300020_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui... C'était bien ce que je pensais. Les pillards du serpent étaient res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300030_THANCRED<tab>The plot thickens...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300030_THANCRED<tab>J'en étais sûr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300040_YSHTOLA<tab>Has there been any movement in Thanalan?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300040_YSHTOLA<tab>Et toi, de ton côté<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300050_THANCRED<tab>It has been blessedly quiet. Which is to say the Amalj'aa are being no more or less of a nuisance than usual, summoning Ifrit with such crystals as they have hoarded.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300050_THANCRED<tab>Rien à signaler. Les Amalj'aa invoquent Ifrit de temps à autre, mais ils utilisent leurs propres réserves de cristaux pour ça.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300060_THANCRED<tab>Urianger, too, reports naught out of the ordinary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300060_THANCRED<tab>Urianger n'a rien remarqué d'anormal non plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300070_YSHTOLA<tab>Then we have our explanation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300070_YSHTOLA<tab>Dans ce cas, il n'y a aucun doute possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300080_MINFILIA<tab>Your explanation for what, pray tell?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300080_MINFILIA<tab>De quoi parlez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300090_YSHTOLA<tab>For the recent spate of crystal thefts in Thanalan. We naturally assumed that the trail would lead us back to the Amalj'aa.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300090_YSHTOLA<tab>Je veux parler des vols de cristaux qui ont eu lieu dans le Thanalan. Nous pensions d'abord qu'ils étaient commandités par les Amalj'aa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300100_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet it did not. It led us across the sea unto Vylbrand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300100_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais la piste des voleurs m'a menée vers la mer... et de là, à l'île de Vylbrand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300110_MINFILIA<tab>Vylbrand...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300110_MINFILIA<tab>Dans la Noscea<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300120_MINFILIA<tab>There <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> been reports of increased Sahagin activity of late...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300120_MINFILIA<tab>Il est vrai qu'on nous a dit que les Sahuagins semblent mijoter quelque chose, depuis quelque temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300130_MINFILIA<tab>Oh gods...they mean to summon Leviathan?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300130_MINFILIA<tab>Tu penses qu'ils se préparent à invoquer leur Primordial<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300140_YSHTOLA<tab>That is the way of it, I fear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300140_YSHTOLA<tab>J'en ai bien peur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300150_YSHTOLA<tab>Whilst conducting our investigation on behalf of the Mineral Concern, we came upon evidence implicating the Serpent Reavers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300150_YSHTOLA<tab>Durant mon enquête, j'ai découvert des preuves de l'implication des pillards du serpent. Je me suis donc rendue à Limsa Lominsa pour en savoir plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300160_YSHTOLA<tab>With the aid of the Maelstrom, I was able to verify our suspicions. 'Tis only a matter of time before Leviathan returns to harrow the seas.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300160_YSHTOLA<tab>J'ai rejoint une équipe du Maelstrom, et je suis arrivée à la conclusion que l'invocation de Léviathan par les Sahuagins est imminente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300170_YSHTOLA<tab>But there is more. One of the Sahagin─an elder, by my judgment─spoke of attaining the “gift and knowledge of eternity.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300170_YSHTOLA<tab>Et ce n'est pas tout. Les hommes-poissons auraient apparemment découvert une “voie de l'éternité”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300180_MINFILIA<tab><moan>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300180_MINFILIA<tab>... Aah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400010_YSHTOLA<tab>Such a disturbance in the aether... If I did not know better, I should think this device defective.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400010_YSHTOLA<tab>Hmm... L'éther est beaucoup plus perturbé que je ne l'imaginais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400020_YSHTOLA<tab>And there is the explanation...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400020_YSHTOLA<tab>Les Sahuagins préparent donc bel et bien la venue de leur Primordial.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400030_WUUR<tab>Soon! Sssoon it shall begin! Our Lord shall rise 'midst sssurging waves to wash away the finless ones!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400030_WUUR<tab>Fsshhh... Tout est prêt<var 1D /var>! Bientôt, notre Dieu va noyer ccces maudits sssans-branchies<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400040_WUUR<tab>And I shall be granted the gift and knowledge of eternity, and with the emissary ssstand equal! Then shall I know no cesssation, no oblivion!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400040_WUUR<tab>Et avec cette voie de l'éternité, je ssserai invincccible, tout comme le messager qui me l'a transmise<var 1D /var>! La mer sssera de nouveau à nous, fsssh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>...Whence comes this promise of immortality? The emissary?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>Un “messager”...<var 1D /var>? Et que peut bien être cette “voie de l'éternité”<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400060_YSHTOLA<tab>We have outstayed our welcome.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400060_YSHTOLA<tab>Il est temps de partir d'ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500010_MINFILIA<tab>“The gift...and knowledge.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500010_MINFILIA<tab>La voie de l'éternité... Cela voudrait dire que...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500020_YSHTOLA<tab>Are the two of you quite well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500020_YSHTOLA<tab>Qu'est-ce qui vous arrive, à vous deux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500030_MINFILIA<tab>You...you shared that vision, did you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500030_MINFILIA<tab>... Tu as vu la même chose que moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500040_MINFILIA<tab>Even before the Sahagin made mention of the emissary, I recognized Elidibus's words. <var 1A 02 /var>He<var 1A 01 /var> is behind this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500040_MINFILIA<tab>La voie de l'éternité... Pouvoir vivre sans jamais craindre la mort... Cela ressemble beaucoup à ce qu'a dit Elidibus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500050_MINFILIA<tab>But surely it is not within his power to grant the Echo?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500050_MINFILIA<tab>Mais alors, ce Sahuagin posséderait aussi le pouvoir de l'Écho<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500060_YSHTOLA<tab>My lady─unless we act swiftly, Leviathan will rise again. The Admiral has already requested that we intervene to prevent this. Failing that, we are to attend to the primal's extermination.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500060_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment très préoccupant, mais dans l'immédiat, il y a plus urgent. L'amirale Bloefhiswyn a demandé l'aide des Héritiers pour empêcher l'invocation de Léviathan, et pour parer à toute éventualité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500070_MINFILIA<tab>She will have our full cooperation. Let us make haste to Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500070_MINFILIA<tab>Puisqu'il s'agit d'un Primordial, nous ne pouvons pas refuser. Allons à Limsa Lominsa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500080_MINFILIA<tab>I mean to play a part in this mission. Tataru─pray take charge in my absence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500080_MINFILIA<tab>Cette fois-ci, je vous accompagne. Tataru, je compte sur toi pour veiller sur le refuge en mon absence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500090_THANCRED<tab>My lady, are you sure this is wise?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500090_THANCRED<tab>C'est beaucoup trop dangereux, Minfilia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500100_MINFILIA<tab>I am aware of the risks. But there is something I must see with mine own eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500100_MINFILIA<tab>Il y a une chose dont je veux m'assurer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500110_MINFILIA<tab>...The true nature of the Echo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500110_MINFILIA<tab>Je veux trouver les réponses... En me rendant sur place, je découvrirai peut-être quelle est la véritable nature de l'Écho.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500120_THANCRED<tab>Very well. I shall not stand in your way...on the condition that you permit me to accompany you as bodyguard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500120_THANCRED<tab>Dans ce cas, je pars aussi. Quelqu'un se doit de protéger notre chef, si jamais les choses tournent mal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500130_MINFILIA<tab>Your company is ever welcome, Thancred.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500130_MINFILIA<tab>Merci, Thancred.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500140_YUGIRI<tab>I take it something ill is afoot?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500140_YUGIRI<tab>Il y a un problème<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500150_YSHTOLA<tab>Aye. A primal is about to be loosed upon Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500150_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui... Un Primordial est sur le point de faire son apparition.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500160_YUGIRI<tab>A...primal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500160_YUGIRI<tab>Un Primordial...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500170_YSHTOLA<tab>A godlike being whose very existence is a bane upon the land. We Scions of the Seventh Dawn are sworn to put an end to their kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500170_YSHTOLA<tab>Ce sont des déités barbares qui menacent Éorzéa. Nous autres, Héritiers de la Septième Aube, avons fait le serment de protéger le monde de ces créatures.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500180_YUGIRI<tab>I see. Know then that I am learned in the arts of war. In return for the kindness you have shown my people, I would lend you my blade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500180_YUGIRI<tab>Dans ce cas, j'aimerais vous accompagner, moi aussi. Après tout ce que vous avez fait pour les miens, il est de mon devoir de vous aider... Et je peux vous être utile en cas de combat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500190_YSHTOLA<tab>It would be most welcome. When contending with a primal, one can never have too many able allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500190_YSHTOLA<tab>Merci beaucoup, Yugiri. Ton aide est la bienvenue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500200_YSHTOLA<tab>If you crave a more intimate understanding of the problems facing Eorzea, this experience is like to provide it. Be sure to come well prepared.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500200_YSHTOLA<tab>Ça te permettra aussi de mieux comprendre les problèmes qui touchent Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600010_YSHTOLA<tab>Damn them... They have made thralls of soldiers and civilians both...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600010_YSHTOLA<tab>Des soldats du Maelstrom... et des civils<var 1D /var>!? Ils ont pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment été enlevés puis subjugués...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600030_THANCRED<tab>Did I miss much?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600030_THANCRED<tab>Vous n'alliez pas commencer sans nous quand même<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600040_YUGIRI<tab>Hah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600040_YUGIRI<tab>Yah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600050_YUGIRI<tab>Yah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600050_YUGIRI<tab>Aah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600060_THANCRED<tab>So that is how you fight in the Far East? Mental note: pick no quarrel with Domans.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600060_THANCRED<tab>Alors, c'est comme ça qu'on se bat à Doma... C'est tout à fait remarquable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600070_THANCRED<tab>But seriously: if I am to keep up, I must needs forsake elegance for efficiency.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600070_THANCRED<tab>À mon tour de vous montrer ce que je sais faire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600080_THANCRED<tab>Yah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600080_THANCRED<tab>Yah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600090_THANCRED<tab>Hah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600090_THANCRED<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600100_YUGIRI<tab>Hmmm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600100_YUGIRI<tab>Im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sionnant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600110_THANCRED<tab>To the aetheryte!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600110_THANCRED<tab>Vite, à l'éthérite primitive<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700010_MERLWYB<tab>You'll forgive me my lateness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700010_MERLWYB<tab>Pardon pour ce retard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700020_THANCRED<tab>I've been something of a liability of late, I know. 'Tis high time I set about making amends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700020_THANCRED<tab>Il est temps que je rachète mes erreurs passées... et autant le faire avec panache<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700030_WUUR<tab>Pshhh! Long have you shriveled shhhorewalkers tormented our kind!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700030_WUUR<tab>Fsshhh... Maudits sssans-branchies<var 1D /var>! Comment osez-vous sssouiller notre territoire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700040_WUUR<tab>But no more! Your time is at an end!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700040_WUUR<tab>Vous avez longtemps opprimé notre peuple, mais aujourd'hui marque votre fin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700050_WUUR<tab>You shall perish with sssalt in your wounds and sssea in your lungs!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700050_WUUR<tab>Fsssh<var 1D /var>! Vous allez mourir la peur au ventre et les poumons remplis d'eau, fsssh<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700060_WUUR<tab>Lord of the Whorl, hearken to our plea!
Lord of the Whorl, deliver us from our misery!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700060_WUUR<tab>Fsssh, ô Léviathan, Déchaîneur des marées<var 1D /var>!
Écoute notre complainte et apporte-nous le réconfort<var 1D /var>!
Sssoulève les vagues et sssubmerge nos ennemis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700070_MERLWYB<tab>Do you feel that!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700070_MERLWYB<tab>Mais que fait-il<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700080_MINFILIA<tab>I know this sensation... It's the Echo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700080_MINFILIA<tab>Cette sensation... Il utilise l'Écho<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700090_MERLWYB<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700090_MERLWYB<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700100_WUUR<tab>Pshhh! Sssuch power! It is...<var 1A 02 /var>transcendent<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700100_WUUR<tab>Fsshhh<var 1D /var>!! C'est donc ççça le véritable pouvoir de l'Écho<var 1D /var>!? Le sssecret de l'éternité m'appartient, fsssh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700110_MERLWYB<tab>Seven hells...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700110_MERLWYB<tab>Par la Navigatrice<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700120_WUUR<tab>Pshhhahahahahaaa! Ssstrike me down if you will! It is futile! I have massstered the gift! I am...<var 1A 02 /var>eternal<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700120_WUUR<tab>Fsshhh<var 1D /var>! Vous ne pouvez rien contre moi, veules sssans-branchies<var 1D /var>! Je suis invincible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700130_WUUR<tab>O mighty Leviathan, ruler of the ssseas, born of waters primordial! I offer unto You this frail fleshhh, that You might grant Your faithful servants deliverance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700130_WUUR<tab>Fsssh<var 1D /var>! Ô grand Léviathan, Ssseigneur des mers<var 1D /var>! Je t'offre ma chair pour que tu libères tes fidèles ssserviteurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700140_WUUR<tab>I beseech You! Come forth!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700140_WUUR<tab>Fsssh<var 1D /var>! Ô Déchaîneur des marées, fsssh, viens à moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700150_MERLWYB<tab>Die, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700150_MERLWYB<tab>Non<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700160_WUUR<tab>Foolishhh shorewalker! You cannot kill that which is eternal!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700160_WUUR<tab>Fsshhhaaaha... Vous ne pouvez pas m'arrêter, humains imbéccciles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700170_YUGIRI<tab>Heavens forfend...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700170_YUGIRI<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'est...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700180_MERLWYB<tab>Damn it all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700180_MERLWYB<tab>C'est Léviathan<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700190_WUUR<tab>Pshhh!? My being...ebbs away... B-But it should by rightsss be infinite!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700190_WUUR<tab>Fsshhh...<var 1D /var>!? Mon être... tout entier... est assspiré par mon Dieu...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700200_WUUR<tab>Am I not...immortal? Curse you, Emissary! You promised me...everlasssting... Pshhh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700200_WUUR<tab>Ne sssuis-je donc pas... immortel<var 1D /var>? Maudit sois-tu, messager... Tu m'avais promis... la vie éternelle, fsssh...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700210_MINFILIA<tab>Wh-Where did he go!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700210_MINFILIA<tab>Il... il a disparu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700220_MERLWYB<tab>What say you? Nary a single ship!? Hells take that sea demon!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700220_MERLWYB<tab>... Comment ça, la flotte a quasiment été anéantie<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700230_MERLWYB<tab>Gather the survivors and get to shore. Leave the wrecks for the pirates.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700230_MERLWYB<tab>Que les navires restants trouvent refuge quelque part... si c'est encore possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700240_MERLWYB<tab>Leviathan wastes no time. The diversionary squadron is lost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700240_MERLWYB<tab>Léviathan s'en est pris à notre escadre de diversion avec violence, avant de partir au large de la Noscea occidentale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700250_MERLWYB<tab>For a mercy, 'twould seem the primal now makes for open sea. But why does he not press his advantage? Unless...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700250_MERLWYB<tab>Mais je ne comprends pas. Pourquoi s'est-il manifesté en pleine mer, et non pas ici...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700260_MERLWYB<tab>Gods save us, he means to unleash a tidal wave!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700260_MERLWYB<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Que les Douze nous protègent<var 1D /var>! Il va déclencher un raz-de-marée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800010_MERLWYB<tab>There used to be a hamlet beyond South Tidegate in western La Noscea. Halfstone, 'twas called.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800010_MERLWYB<tab>Il y avait autrefois dans la Noscea occidentale une colonie appelée Demipierre, située de l'autre côté des barrages nord et sud actuels.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800020_MERLWYB<tab>Some years prior to the Maelstrom's founding, Leviathan rose from the briny depths, and set about unleashing watery hell upon us. On that occasion, the Company of Heroes put him down before he could do too much damage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800020_MERLWYB<tab>Quelques années avant que le Maelstrom ne soit fondé, Léviathan avait été invoqué par les Sahuagins. La Fratrie des gabiers avait réussi à le vaincre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800030_MERLWYB<tab>But when the bastard came next, this time in the wake of the Calamity, we were not so fortunate. Weary of ravaging our shoreline, he summoned a tidal wave which fair leveled Halfstone, and washed the soil away for good measure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800030_MERLWYB<tab>Mais le Primordial de la mer a été rappelé juste après le Fléau, et la déferlante qu'il a déclenchée a com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment dévasté cette colonie, emportant toute la terre et ne laissant que quelques rochers.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800040_YSHTOLA<tab>The area was subsequently occupied by the Sahagin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800040_YSHTOLA<tab>Cet endroit est désormais le Frai de Sapsa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800050_MERLWYB<tab>Aye, the thrice-damned creatures transformed it into a spawning ground for their brood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800050_MERLWYB<tab>Exactement. Les Sahuagins ont modifié le terrain pour leurs besoins, et souhaitent en faire un vaste lieu de ponte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800060_MERLWYB<tab>Given the quantity of crystals stolen to feed him and his legion of thralls, we can be fairly sure that Leviathan is stronger now than in his previous incarnations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800060_MERLWYB<tab>Étant donné la quantité de cristaux volés et le nombre de subjugués, il y a fort à craindre que Léviathan soit plus puissant qu'il ne l'a jamais été.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800070_MERLWYB<tab>If that sea demon is left to wreak havoc, what befell Halfstone may well befall a larger settlement─even Limsa.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800070_MERLWYB<tab>Si nous le laissons provoquer un nouveau raz-de-marée, il est probable que les dégâts iront bien au-delà de ce qu'a subi Demipierre. Limsa Lominsa tout entière pourrait disparaître sous les flots.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800080_MERLWYB<tab>That <var 1A 02 /var>cannot<var 1A 01 /var> happen. The primal must be stopped.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800080_MERLWYB<tab>Nous devons l'abattre à tout prix<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800090_THANCRED<tab>That was ever our objective, Admiral. But how are we to achieve it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800090_THANCRED<tab>Mais que pouvons-nous faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800100_THANCRED<tab>The sea is Leviathan's uncontested domain. The ships of the Third Squadron could not close to within a hundred yalms of the primal, nor could their cannons pierce his defenses.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800100_THANCRED<tab>La mer est le domaine de Léviathan, et votre 3e escadre a été quasiment détruite avant même de pouvoir l'approcher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800110_MERLWYB<tab>I have read the reports, Master Thancred. Our warships may as well have been bloody pleasure barges for all the good they did. Seven hells... Is there no way that we might strike back?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800110_MERLWYB<tab>Certes... Mes hommes m'ont également signalé que les canons n'avaient aucun effet sur ce monstre... Il doit pourtant bien y avoir une solution.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800120_YSHTOLA<tab>The Company of Heroes defeated Leviathan having first lured him into an inlet, but we must needs contend with him upon the open sea. It will avail us little to consult past experience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800120_YSHTOLA<tab>La seule fois où il a été vaincu, Léviathan avait été attiré dans une crique. Ce qui ne nous aide pas beaucoup dans la situation actuelle. Les anciens de la Fratrie ignorent cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment comment le combattre en pleine mer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800130_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Admiral, if I may.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800130_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Amirale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800140_MERLWYB<tab>Speak freely, Marshal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800140_MERLWYB<tab>Je t'écoute, Eynzahr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800150_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>By all accounts, Leviathan's most formidable weapon is the very sea itself. Waves and whirlpools, tides and currents─all these things are his to command. The key to victory, I believe, lies in disarming our foe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800150_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>D'après les rapports des survivants, les attaques de Léviathan sont des déferlantes, autrement dit, elles sont constituées d'eau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800160_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>This, in effect, is what the Company of Heroes achieved with their ruse. We cannot lure Leviathan from the sea a second time, but what if we could weaken his hold upon the element of water? I have heard of devices capable of such wonders. They draw upon the power of corrupted crystals, I am told.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800160_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Aussi, je pense que nous devrions essayer de les affaiblir en convertissant une partie de cette énergie aqueuse en un autre élément.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800170_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>If mounted upon a ship, such a device might be used to prevent Leviathan from bringing the full force of the sea to bear against us, rendering him no more dangerous than any other sea serpent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800170_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Nous pourrions utiliser les facultés des cristaux corrompus pour créer une barrière magique que nous installerions sur l'un de nos navires.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800180_MINFILIA<tab>Of course... Cid built a similar device to grant the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> safe passage through Garuda's tempest, did he not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800180_MINFILIA<tab>C'est la même stratégie que celle utilisée pour franchir les bourrasques de Garuda. Je me souviens l'avoir lue dans le rapport d'Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800190_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Begging your pardon, my lady, but to give credit where it's due, this is something I heard from an old arcanist friend of mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800190_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Moi, c'est un vieil ami arcaniste qui m'a fait part de ce plan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800200_MERLWYB<tab>It makes little difference who thought of it first, so long as it works. Beg the specifications of this device from your friend, and I shall pass them on to our people at Naldiq & Vymelli's.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800200_MERLWYB<tab>Intéressant... Je pense que la société Naldiq et Vymelli devrait être capable de fabriquer quelque chose de semblable sans faire appel à Cid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800210_MERLWYB<tab>But before we proceed any further, I would voice one concern: piercing Garuda's defenses is one thing, suppressing Leviathan's attacks quite another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800210_MERLWYB<tab>Cette fois-ci, le dispositif n'aura pas pour fonction de percer les défenses de notre ennemi, mais de nous protéger de ses attaques.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800220_MERLWYB<tab>In matters of science, I am as a babbling babe, but I cannot well imagine that such a feat would be possible without a veritable mountain of corrupted crystals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800220_MERLWYB<tab>Mais il nous faudra une très grande quantité de cristaux corrompus pour neutraliser les puissantes vagues de Léviathan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800230_MERLWYB<tab>The question being: do we have a ship big enough to bear such a burden?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800230_MERLWYB<tab>Le Maelstrom ne dispose pas de vaisseau qui puisse naviguer avec une telle charge.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800240_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Mayhap not, Admiral. But two might. Recall you the tale of Mistbeard's greatest haul? It is said that he lashed two ships together, side by side, the better to bear his plunder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800240_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Il paraît qu'autrefois, les pirates de Barbe-Brume ont relié deux bateaux pour transporter un important butin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800250_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>By your leave, we might attempt to repeat the trick. The gods know, it would be quicker than building a new vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800250_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Nous pourrions en faire de même avec les navires rescapés de la 3e escadre. Cela devrait nous permettre de transporter les cristaux corrompus dont nous avons besoin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800260_MERLWYB<tab>Mistbeard did this? Truly, Marshal, upon the subject of the pirate king, you are as a scholar.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800260_MERLWYB<tab>Barbe-Brume avait fait ça<var 1D /var>? Je vois que tu connais très bien l'histoire des pirates, Eynzahr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800270_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Now, from what I have gleaned of these matters, the device will need to be in close and constant proximity to the target. To wit, we must lash our twin vessel to Leviathan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800270_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Aheum<var 1D /var>! Il nous suffirait de tirer ce catamaran géant au moyen d'un de nos navires avant de le faire entrer en collision avec le Primordial.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800280_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>This in itself will be no small feat. Ramming speed will be required, but given the weight of the cargo, that will only be attainable with the aid of a towing vessel...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800280_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Si cette stratégie réussit, nous aurons alors de grandes chances d'abattre Léviathan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800290_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Suffice it to say, the task of piloting said vessel will entail considerable danger, and I would not ask it of another. I volunteer myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800290_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Comme c'est ma proposition, je vais me charger des opérations de remorquage, qui risquent d'être périlleuses.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800300_MERLWYB<tab>'Twill be dangerous for all involved...but we have no better recourse. Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800300_MERLWYB<tab>C'est vraiment une idée folle... mais j'imagine que c'est la seule stratégie susceptible de marcher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800310_MERLWYB<tab>Commodore. Assemble the remnants of the fleet at Moraby Bay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800310_MERLWYB<tab>Reyner<var 1D /var>? C'est moi. Rassemble les navires dans la baie de Moraby.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800320_MERLWYB<tab>Give priority to our soundest vessels. The repairs can wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800320_MERLWYB<tab>Oui, donne la priorité à ceux en état de naviguer. Les réparations peuvent attendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800330_MERLWYB<tab>Storm Marshal Slafyrsyn, command of the operation is yours. I want that twin vessel ready to sail posthaste.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800330_MERLWYB<tab>Grand maréchal Slafyrsyn, je vous confie le commandement de cette opération. Faites en sorte que ce catamaran soit prêt au plus vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800340_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>At once, Admiral!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800340_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>À vos ordres, Amirale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800350_MERLWYB<tab>And then there is the small matter of slaying the beast... The fate of Limsa Lominsa rests upon your shoulders once again. Go well, Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800350_MERLWYB<tab>Notre sort est entre tes mains, Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière. Je compte sur toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900010_MERLWYB<tab>We Lominsans are sworn to strive “Till sea swallows all”─and swallow all it would have, had Leviathan prevailed. That we still strive now, we owe in no small part to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900010_MERLWYB<tab>Bravo. En terrassant Léviathan, tu as protégé Limsa Lominsa d'un raz-de-marée dévastateur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900020_MERLWYB<tab>Not for the first time, you have delivered Limsa Lominsa from the wrath of a primal. Never has our nation known a stouter ally.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900020_MERLWYB<tab>Après Titan, c'est la deuxième fois que tu nous sauves de la menace des Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900030_MERLWYB<tab>On behalf of my people, I give you my humblest thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900030_MERLWYB<tab>Au nom de tous les Limséens, je te remercie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900040_MERLWYB<tab>'Tis meet that I give thanks to old Mistbeard, too, for his fine solution. Whatever else he may have been, 'tis clear he was a resourceful soul. Would that I had a man like him in my service.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900040_MERLWYB<tab>Je dois admettre que je n'imaginais pas qu'une telle stratégie fonctionnerait aussi bien. Il est peut-être temps pour moi de revoir l'or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion du Maelstrom, notamment les fonctions d'un homme qui sait beaucoup de choses sur Barbe-Brume.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900050_YUGIRI<tab>Before I set foot in these lands, I had no inkling that the people of Eorzea contended with such mighty foes. Suffice it to say, their existence came as something of a shock─as did the idea that they could be defeated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900050_YUGIRI<tab>J'ignorais que les Éorzéens devaient faire face à des créatures aussi dangereuses que ces Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900060_YUGIRI<tab>This experience has served to remind me of the vastness of the world...and the boundless potential of man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900060_YUGIRI<tab>Je suis im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>née par le courage et la force dont vous avez fait preuve pour triompher de l'un d'entre eux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900070_YUGIRI<tab>Though I am but a refugee in this realm, I would fain be of use to you in your fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900070_YUGIRI<tab>Même si je ne suis qu'une réfugiée, j'aimerais vous aider en vous transmettant les techniques de combat de mon peuple.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900080_YUGIRI<tab>Know that I am tutored in one of the foremost combat arts of the Far East. It may seem...outlandish to the Eorzean eye, but should any of your people care to learn, I would be pleased to initiate them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900080_YUGIRI<tab>Elles sont assez par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>res, mais je suis sûre que vous saurez en tirer parti.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900090_MERLWYB<tab>And I will see to it that they are grateful. I have no doubt that your knowledge and skills will serve us well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900090_MERLWYB<tab>Voilà une excellente idée. Ces techniques nous seront cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment très utiles à l'avenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900100_MERLWYB<tab>Besides, your art is not so outlandish as you think. Would you not agree, Master Thancred?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900100_MERLWYB<tab>Tu as dit qu'elles étaient assez par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>res, mais elles me rappellent celles qu'utilisent certaines personnes par ici... N'est-ce pas, Thancred<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900110_THANCRED<tab>Naught escapes your searching eye, Admiral.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900110_THANCRED<tab>Je vois que rien ne vous échappe, Amirale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900120_THANCRED<tab>Few are privy to this information, but Limsa Lominsa is home to a certain...secret fraternity. Its members are trained in a form of combat not unlike your own.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900120_THANCRED<tab>Je connais une certaine société secrète à Limsa Lominsa, une or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion qui agit dans l'ombre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900130_THANCRED<tab>By my judgment, it should not be beyond such individuals to adapt to the techniques I witnessed you employing with such admirable deftness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900130_THANCRED<tab>Ses membres ont une façon de se battre qui ressemble beaucoup à la vôtre, Yugiri. En combinant ces deux styles, je suis persuadé que nous pourrions mettre au point quelque chose de très intéressant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900140_YUGIRI<tab>I am heartened to hear this. I, too, noted a kinship between your style and mine own. Though it seemed to me that you fought differently in the beginning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900140_YUGIRI<tab>J'ai moi aussi remarqué des similitudes dans nos techniques... Mais au début, vous vous battiez dif<var 16 /var>fé<var 16 /var>rem<var 16 /var>ment, il me semble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900150_THANCRED<tab>A-Aye, I suppose I did... What can I say? I am a man of many talents. Hahaha...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900150_THANCRED<tab>Euh, oui... Disons que j'ai certaines raisons que je préfère ne pas expliquer. Hé hé hé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900160_YSHTOLA<tab>Though you may labor to believe it, Thancred was once something of a scoundrel, who fraternized with the criminal class in these parts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900160_YSHTOLA<tab>En fait, notre cher Thancred s'adonnait au larcin dans cette ville, autrefois. Et il avait tissé des liens étroits avec cette fameuse société secrète à l'époque.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900170_THANCRED<tab>Y-Y'shtola! You jest, of course!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900170_THANCRED<tab>Ça suffit, Y'shtola<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900180_MINFILIA<tab>But for a chance encounter with Alphinaud's grandsire, he might never have left Limsa Lominsa; or received an education in Sharlayan; or taken up his post in Ul'dah─which is where he trained in the blade, lest you wonder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900180_MINFILIA<tab>Oui, et c'est grâce à notre défunt maître Louisoix qu'il est rentré dans le droit chemin. Tu as abandonné ta carrière de voleur avant d'apprendre à manier l'épée à Ul'dah, n'est-ce pas, Thancred<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900190_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia─please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900190_THANCRED<tab>Vous n'allez pas vous y mettre vous aussi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900200_YUGIRI<tab>It would seem there is more to you than meets the eye, Master Thancred.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900200_YUGIRI<tab>Je vois. Vous vouliez cacher votre passé. Vous me semblez être un personnage intéressant, Messire Thancred.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900210_MERLWYB<tab>Lady Yugiri─I am told that you and yours came to Eorzea seeking permanent resettlement, and that many Domans have since been engaged as frontier hands at Revenant's Toll. Mor Dhona is many things, but a place of refuge it is not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900210_MERLWYB<tab>Yugiri, d'après ce qu'on m'a dit, toi et ton peuple avez fui l'Orient pour vous réfugier en Éorzéa, et vous êtes installés au Glas des revenants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900220_MERLWYB<tab>Know that I would like nothing better than to furnish your people with a new home here on Lominsan soil. Alas, racked by instability as we are, our nation is in no fit state to take you in.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900220_MERLWYB<tab>Limsa Lominsa a beaucoup de problèmes à gérer et ne peut malheureusement pas vous accueillir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900230_MERLWYB<tab>Yet I'll not have it said that we turned a blind eye to your suffering. Until such time as we can do more, I pledge to send provisions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900230_MERLWYB<tab>Nous pouvons toutefois vous fournir du matériel. Ce sera notre manière de te remercier pour ton aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900240_YUGIRI<tab>We are in your debt, Admiral. I realize that it scarce qualifies as repayment, but if it please you, I shall set about sharing my martial knowledge with your people at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900240_YUGIRI<tab>Je vous en suis très re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sante, Amirale. Je vais faire le nécessaire pour que nos con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces martiales se diffusent ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900250_MERLWYB<tab>You wished a word in private.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900250_MERLWYB<tab>De quoi veux-tu me parler au juste<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900260_YSHTOLA<tab>The better not to spoil the festive mood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900260_YSHTOLA<tab>L'Histoire se répète une fois de plus...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900270_YSHTOLA<tab>History repeats itself, Admiral. As the kobolds did before them, the Sahagin resorted to summoning their god over a territorial feud. They acted in self-preservation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900270_YSHTOLA<tab>Si les Kobolds et les Sahuagins ont invoqué leurs Primordiaux, c'est parce qu'ils sont en conflit avec les humains. Chacun souhaite s'approprier Vylbrand...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900280_YSHTOLA<tab>It may be that the Sahagin initiated this particular clash, but how it begins does not interest me so much as how it ends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900280_YSHTOLA<tab>En fin de compte, la nature du problème est la même<var 1D /var>: ces tribus désirent seulement avoir un lieu où vivre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900290_MERLWYB<tab>I have not forgotten our conversation, Y'shtola. I am aware that man bears part of the blame for the primals' existence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900290_MERLWYB<tab>Je le sais bien... Nous sommes l'origine même de ces invocations de Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900300_MERLWYB<tab>Nor am I ignorant of the Sahagin's reason for acting. They sought to secure a place to breed and multiply, that their kind might survive. Self-preservation, as you say.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900300_MERLWYB<tab>Comme tu le dis, c'est pour s'assurer un territoire et pour survivre qu'ils se battent contre nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900310_MERLWYB<tab>But we have as much right to live and thrive as they. If our own survival is threatened, are we to lay down our arms and welcome oblivion? Nay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900310_MERLWYB<tab>... Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, nous sommes dans la même situation. Pour cette raison, nous ne pouvons pas laisser faire les Kobolds et les Sahuagins.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900320_YSHTOLA<tab>And so you kill, that you might live. Yet if living is a right, then that right belongs to all peoples, be they men or beastmen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900320_YSHTOLA<tab>S'entre-tuer pour survivre... Il est légitime de vouloir vivre, et cela devrait être vrai pour tous les peuples. Difficile de différencier le bien du mal dans cette situation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900330_MERLWYB<tab>I'll not deny your reasoning. But when a storm gathers, it falls to me to see my people safely through it. That is my duty, and I shall do it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900330_MERLWYB<tab>C'est pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment égoïste, mais pour le moment nous n'avons pas d'autre choix que de croire que ce nous faisons est juste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900340_YSHTOLA<tab>As must we all, Admiral. Stay the course, then, but know that it will lead to no good end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900340_YSHTOLA<tab>Dans le doute, il faut s'efforcer d'avoir la conviction qu'on agit pour le bien... Je dirais même que c'est in<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>pen<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900350_YUGIRI<tab>Man has ever put himself first and foremost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900350_YUGIRI<tab>Croire que ses actions sont justes... Les Hommes sont les mêmes quels que soient les desseins qui les animent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900360_YUGIRI<tab>To justify his actions, he clads himself in the armor of righteousness─though it be a fancy of his own making. In this, mayhap the Garleans and we Domans are not so different...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900360_YUGIRI<tab>Ils ne peuvent pas vivre sans donner un sens à leurs actes. De ce point de vue, l'Empire et Doma ne sont pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment pas très différents.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900370_MERLWYB<tab>Eorzea has become as a raging sea. If we are to keep our heads above the waves, we cannot scruple to drown the man next to us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900370_MERLWYB<tab>Éorzéa est en plein cœur d'un tourbillon de chaos. C'est pour ça que les humains se battent, afin de naviguer à travers la fureur des flots... Et ce, même s'il leur faut se heurter aux convictions des autres peuples.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900380_MERLWYB<tab>When hopes of coexistence founder, strength must determine who has the greater right to live.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900380_MERLWYB<tab>Agir pour survivre. Se battre pour trouver sa place. Croire en soi pour subsister... Telle est sans doute notre destinée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00010_MINFILIA<tab>I have been reflecting upon the events which took place during our visit to Vylbrand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00010_MINFILIA<tab>Si tu le permets, j'aimerais te parler de quelque chose.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00020_MINFILIA<tab>If you have a moment, I would share my conclusions with you. Please bear with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00020_MINFILIA<tab>Je n'arrête pas d'y penser depuis que nous sommes rentrés de Limsa Lominsa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00030_MINFILIA<tab>When the Sahagin elder summoned Leviathan, he employed the power we have come to know as the Echo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00030_MINFILIA<tab>Comme tu l'as vu, le chef sahuagin a utilisé l'Écho lorsqu'il a invoqué Léviathan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00040_MINFILIA<tab>Though I cannot well explain the how of it, it would seem he became immortal in so doing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00040_MINFILIA<tab>Ce pouvoir lui a permis d'être invincible pendant un bref instant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00050_MINFILIA<tab>When the Admiral subsequently slew him, his spirit emerged from his lifeless flesh, a consciousness shorn of physical form.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00050_MINFILIA<tab>Les anciens récits parlent d'âmes qui renaissent à chaque Fléau pour affronter l'adversité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00060_MINFILIA<tab>Thus transfigured, he took up residence in the body of his minion with the ease of a man donning a favorite glove.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00060_MINFILIA<tab>Je me demande si ce pouvoir de réincarnation ne serait pas l'essence même de l'Écho.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00070_MINFILIA<tab>Long have I known that the Echo allows one to pass through the walls of a man's soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00070_MINFILIA<tab>En tout cas, ce que nous avons vu dans la Noscea n'a fait que renforcer cette idée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00080_MINFILIA<tab>But never did I imagine that it could free us from our own flesh, nor less that our souls could then occupy the next corporeal vessel to take our fancy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00080_MINFILIA<tab>Un être éthéré capable de changer de corps... comme s'il pouvait renaître à son gré.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00090_MINFILIA<tab>It was of this that Elidibus spoke─an existence which knows neither cessation nor oblivion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00090_MINFILIA<tab>Si ces anciennes légendes sont vraies, nous allons peut-être découvrir le véritable pouvoir de l'Écho.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00100_MINFILIA<tab>And yet, though the Sahagin had mastered his gift and thereby become immortal, he was by no means invulnerable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00100_MINFILIA<tab>... Celui qui permet de voir les gens par-delà les barrières de la langue, de l'âme et du temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00110_MINFILIA<tab>As we both bore witness, he was ultimately absorbed into Leviathan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00110_MINFILIA<tab>Comme tu en as fait l'expérience jusqu'à présent, l'Écho nous ouvre les portes de l'esprit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00120_MINFILIA<tab>And the import of this observation? If the Ascians' mode of existence is indeed the same, it can be inferred that they, too, are not invulnerable─that they <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> be destroyed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00120_MINFILIA<tab>Mais alors, que peut bien être ce pouvoir de réincarnation<var 1D /var>? Est-ce la faculté de passer d'un corps à un autre que nous a démontrée ce Sahuagin<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00130_MINFILIA<tab>There exists a legend which tells of souls who are reborn upon the cusp of each Umbral Calamity, that they might stay the encroaching Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00130_MINFILIA<tab>Le plus grand pouvoir de l'Écho est-il la possibilité de franchir les barrières corporelles<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00140_MINFILIA<tab>To most, it is but a faerie tale, yet recent events have given me cause to wonder: could the legend in fact refer to the Echo?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00140_MINFILIA<tab>C'est peut-être ce que cet Ascien, Elidibus, disait au sujet du fait de n'être pas touché par la mort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00150_MINFILIA<tab>Much and more yet remains unknown, but I am confident that all will become clear in time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00150_MINFILIA<tab>Pourtant, le chef sahuagin censé être devenu immortel a été aspiré lorsque Léviathan s'est manifesté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00160_MINFILIA<tab>For the present, however, what matters is that the key to defeating the Ascians may at last be within sight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00160_MINFILIA<tab>Donc, devenir éternel ne signifie pas être immortel pour autant. Il y a peut-être là un indice qui nous permettra de nous débarrasser des Asciens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00170_MINFILIA<tab>With Urianger's aid, it is my hope that I shall fathom this matter ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00170_MINFILIA<tab>Le pouvoir de l'Écho, l'annihilation des Asciens... Je vais continuer d'enquêter là-dessus avec Urianger.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00180_MINFILIA<tab>Ah! I was just about to send for you, my friend.
...Is aught amiss?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00180_MINFILIA<tab>Ah, Urianger, vous tombez bien... Quelque chose ne va pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00190_URIANGER<tab>Grave tidings from the Sharlayan motherland, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00190_URIANGER<tab>Minfilia, j'ai de bien mauvaises nouvelles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00200_URIANGER<tab>It doth concern our distant allies, the Students of Baldesion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00200_URIANGER<tab>J'essayais de savoir par le biais de Sharlayan pourquoi les Élèves de Baldesion ne donnaient plus de signes de vie, et...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00210_MINFILIA<tab>What of them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00210_MINFILIA<tab>Que s'est-il passé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00220_URIANGER<tab>My lady...the Isle of Val, which for many years hath been the order's home, is no more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00220_URIANGER<tab>J'ai appris que l'île de Val où se trouvait leur siège n'est plus...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00230_MINFILIA<tab>No more? Whatever do you mean?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00230_MINFILIA<tab>Co... comment ça, elle n'est plus<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00240_URIANGER<tab>I relate only that which hath been conveyed unto me by our agents. An aetheric wave of the highest magnitude was recorded in the region. Soon thereafter, 'twas observed that the isle had ceased to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00240_URIANGER<tab>Une puissante onde magique aurait été enregistrée à Sharlayan...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00250_URIANGER<tab>'Tis postulated that a magick was evoked, like in power to Ultima.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00250_URIANGER<tab>L'île aurait été frappée par un sort de magie ancienne du même type qu'Ultima...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00260_MINFILIA<tab>Twelve preserve...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00260_MINFILIA<tab>Par les Douze<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00010_LOLORITO<tab>If there are no other matters, I move that today's meeting be adjourned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00010_LOLORITO<tab>Bien, ceci clôt l'assemblée d'aujourd'hui. Au revoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00020_FOLLOWEROFTELEDJI<tab>It is done, my lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00020_FOLLOWEROFTELEDJI<tab>Maître, tout est prêt, comme vous le vouliez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00030_FOLLOWEROFTELEDJI<tab>I... <cough> F-Forgive my impertinence, my lord, but these orders... I am uncertain as to what end they serve.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00030_FOLLOWEROFTELEDJI<tab>Si vous me permettez, que désirez-vous faire au juste<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Revolution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Mais, déclencher une guerre, bien sûr...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_C00010_GILGAMESH<tab>Um. Well, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_C00010_GILGAMESH<tab>J'ai eu ma dose... Restons-en là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_C00020_GILGAMESH<tab>That's enough of a beating for now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_C00020_GILGAMESH<tab>Je me retire, mais je n'ai pas dit mon dernier mot<var 1D /var>!
